page.title: 14TRANSPORT.
page.content: { THE RAILWAY STATION Quite alot as trains run through Hexham every day from Newcastle to Carlisle Â£1.00.A bell rings when a train is going to leave also when the train is here so the people know when the train is here so they dont miss it . Hexham is the middle station. There are signals on the railway to warn of approaching trains. The signals are red with white stripes and are quite tall.The station has a shop which sells sweets and newspapers to read on the train.It has a big blue bridge which goes from one side to the other side of the station.The trains are blue with yellow front for carrying people .But there are other trains called freight trains which carry coal,heaiy goods ect.they are diesel trains.
